events.message: The customer reported a car collision that occurred on April 30th, requesting to open an insurance claim for the damages sustained.
The claim was reviewed and categorised under Auto Accident due to involvement of a vehicle collision on a highway.
An agent was assigned to manage the case, ensuring proper process follow-up and customer communication.
The claim has been acknowledged successfully and the claimant was informed about the next steps in the process.
Request sent to the claimant for the vehicle repair estimate, police report, and photos from the collision scene.
The claimant submitted all requested documents, including the repair report and official police report for review.
The investigation team began examining the submitted evidence and assessing liability for the accident.
The investigation concluded that the claimant’s vehicle was damaged due to another driver’s negligence.
A settlement proposal was sent to the claimant offering compensation for repair costs and related expenses.
The claimant responded positively to the settlement offer and confirmed agreement to proceed with payment.
The claim was formally approved by the underwriting department following all validations.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount was issued to the claimant’s nominated bank account.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that the claimant received the payment and no further issues were reported.
The entire case file was archived in the system for future reference and compliance purposes.
